title.title: Chart ID
title.description: Identifies the chart in the document. Cannot contain spaces or special characters. Example: Chart description - 'Funding by area'; Chart ID - 'funding-area'

desc.title: Description
desc.description: Chart description (caption) explaining what the chart is showing. Will display as a heading before the chart graphic.

value.title: Chart data
value.description: This is a list of items, each representing a single segment in the burst chart.

items.title: Segment
items.description: A segment of the burst chart showing a single value.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: The text to put in front of the number, e.g. currency sign.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The text to put after the number, e.g. units or % sign
